metadata.description: Tag for application environment (ex. Dev, QA, Prodfix, Perf, Prod)
Tag for security zone (ex. Internal Non-Sensitive Dev-Test)
Size in GB for the OS disk attached to the VM (ex. 128)
Size in GB for the data disk attached to the VM (ex. 128)
Number of data disks to add to the system of the dataDiskSizeInGB (you cannot vary sizes)
Resource group for the VNet where the VM is being deployed (ex. drsgrp-azshr01)
Name of the VNet where the VM is being deployed (ex. dvnetw-azshr01)
Name of the subnet where the VM is being deployed (ex. WEB, APP, DB, INF)
Static IP Address of the VM
The storage account to use for boot diagnostics data (ex. ussacazpcc03)
The ordered list of recipes or roles to assign the new machine
A list of tags to be applied to the node in chef
The environment to assign the new machine to in chef
